body:
Simple ones that could be made in YML. I am up for ideas because I personally think Avicus needs more content and I want to innovate + be more creative, hopefully give the playerbase more variety and fun

Questions can be posted below about them and go in detail when explaining a gamemode. I can provide maps btw

Idea List:

Other one was archived and locked because people didn't listen. Do NOT suggest Blitz, CTW, DTC, or SG. I want actual minigames, not copies or constant repeating. Be original >->

title: Gamemodes YOU want to see?

replies.body:
i would like to see how robo's grab and run game plays out

EDIT: this http://avicus.net/forums/148c98fdf

replies.body: I had an original idea! It was called Hostages where there is a villager in the middle and there is two teams and there trying to keep it on their side for 3 minutes!  I also suggested that villager could give messages to you if your close by, it could be helpful, royal-like, or sarcastic remarks.  What ever the map maker wanted it to say!

Is that possible?

replies.body:
Project Ares. 

Seriously:

  • Kill the monument (High hp mob or wither for monument)
  • Capture the pig (CTW with riding pigs back instead of wools)
  • Nexus FFA
  • Assault (old Avicus accepted idea)
  • Capture the Beacons (old Avicus accepted idea)
  • Wolves vs pigs (old Avicus accepted idea)

replies.body: Temple run? Like a 1v1v1v1v1v1v1v1v1 etc. and you run while there is smoke chasing you? I mean there is Jerry and Harry but.. I think it could be a great addition :P

replies.body:
probably not possible but im still gonna say it:
hide and seek, you can pick a block like you would pick a kit in walls or nexus, premium ranks get more blocks unlocked. it could be original in that we would make our own maps, but like i said i don't know if it's possible.

replies.body: How about One in the chamber? that is always fun! Or infection. Infection is where one person is a zombie who has to try and infect everyone in order to win. The last survivor is the winner!
